mapper.insert: insert into member(MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_ADDR, MEM_TEL, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_GENDER, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_DATE) values(#{mem_id},#{mem_pw},#{mem_name},#{mem_addr},#{mem_tel},#{mem_birth},#{mem_gender},#{mem_email},now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where mem_id = #{mem_id}
